query.statement:
SELECT C.JOB_CD ,C.JOB_NAME ,C.SUB_JOB_CD ,C.SUB_JOB_NAME ,B.UPJANG ,C.UPJANGNM ,B.RECIPE_CD ,B.RECIPE_NAME , B.RECIPE_CD || B.UPJANG AS RECIPE_CD_SORT , B.RECIPE_NAME || B.UPJANG AS RECIPE_NAME_SORT ,G.ITEM_CODE ,H.ITEM_NAME ,ROUND(AVG(NEED_QTY),2) AS NEED_QTY_AVG FROM FSR_UPJANG_RECIPE_MST B ,MAC_UPJANG_V C ,FSR_UPJANG_RECIPE_ITEM G ,( SELECT ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SIZE, PO_UOM, KG_CONVERT_RATE FROM HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CLASS1 = 'F' ) H
,FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST F
WHERE B.UPJANG = G.UPJANG AND B.HALL_CLASS = G.HALL_CLASS AND B.RECIPE_CD = G.RECIPE_CD AND G.ITEM_CODE = H.ITEM_CODE AND B.UPJANG = C.UPJANG
AND C.JOB_CD = #JOB_CD#
AND C.SUB_JOB_CD = #SUB_JOB#
AND B.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND B.HALL_CLASS = #HALL_CLASS#
AND B.RECIPE_CLASS = #RECIPE_CLASS#
AND B.RECIPE_TYPE = #RECIPE_TYPE#
AND B.CUISINE_TYPE = #CUISINE_TYPE#
AND B.RECIPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #RECIPE_NAME# || '%'
AND B.RECIPE_CD = F.RECIPE_CD AND TO_CHAR(F.CDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT#
GROUP BY C.JOB_CD,C.JOB_NAME,C.SUB_JOB_CD,C.SUB_JOB_NAME,B.UPJANG,C.UPJANGNM,B.RECIPE_CD,B.RECIPE_NAME,G.ITEM_CODE,H.ITEM_NAME ORDER BY C.JOB_CD,C.SUB_JOB_CD,C.UPJANGNM,B.RECIPE_CD,B.RECIPE_NAME,G.ITEM_CODE,H.ITEM_NAME
